title: Emails and Attachments sent to KLHARTMAN@NYCOURTS.GOV

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1.) Copy of the 6/19/2024 email and all attachments received by recipient KLHARTMAN@NYCOURTS.GOV from sender KEVINRIFORD@OUTLOOK.COM
2.) Copy of any emails sent from sender KLHARTMAN@NYCOURTS.GOV to recipient KEVINRIFORD@OUTLOOK.COM between 6/19/2024 through the date of processing this FOIL request.

3.) Copy of the 6/20/2024 email and all attachments received by recipient KLHARTMAN@NYCOURTS.GOV from sender KATIE.L.RIFORD3@OUTLOOK.com
2.) Copy of any emails sent from sender KLHARTMAN@NYCOURTS.GOV to recipient KATIE.L.RIFORD3@OUTLOOK.com between 6/20/2024 through the date of processing this FOIL request.

In order to better aid your search, see included attachments. Thanks!

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alice Borne
